daoLayer

Interface CouponDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CouponDBDAO

    public interface CouponDAO
    The interface that CouponDBDAO implements from. it has all the crucial coupon related methods for communicating with the data base.
    Version:
    1.0 February 20, 2017.
    Author:
    Ehud Perlman
